content.html: To be fair, Google Stadia faced terrible odds in the past 3 years, having to deal with: - a global pandemic forcing people to turn to online entertainment. - graphic cards and console shortages, creating high demand for alternatives. If only they hit the market at a better time
content.value:
To be fair, Google Stadia faced terrible odds in the past 3 years, having to deal with:
- a global pandemic forcing people to turn to online entertainment.
- graphic cards and console shortages, creating high demand for alternatives. 

If only they hit the market at a better time
